constituent: carry, army, chariot, crown, vehicle, car, road
heisigStory: A long string of "sweet" chariots "swinging low" to our roads is a sure sign that the Lord is "comin' for to carry" someone home.
koohiiStory1: Don’t confuse it with “take along” (287). In that one, there was a car so you could take along your friends once you found them on the road. In this one, there is an army chariot just to carry military supplies (sorry no room for you).
koohiiStory2: Roads carry armies (in contrast to seas carrying navies or skies carrying air forces).
myStory: mang vác. quân đội đi vòng vòng để mang vác
